user_query: I am a photographer planning a collaborative project with other photographers. Can you provide me with all the active users in the system along with their names and profile photos? Additionally, fetch all the collections created by each user, including the number of images in each collection and the number of images approved, discarded, and pending for each collection.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of all active users in the system, including their names and profile photos.
For each active user retrieved in Step 1, fetch all collections created by them.
For each collection fetched in Step 2, gather the number of images in each collection, as well as the counts for approved, discarded, and pending images.
